titles.title: Celebrating the anniversary of the enactment of Public Law 87-788, commonly known as the McIntire-Stennis Cooperative Forestry Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Energy, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 4/11/2013--Introduced. Celebrates the anniversary of the enactment of the McIntire-Stennis Cooperative Forestry Act. Affirms the importance of the state-supported colleges and universities conducting forestry research and training supported by such Act.
